website_summaries.verdict: A fun, novelty hot dog roller that can cook up to 4 hotdogs while warming up to 4 buns.
pros: This affordably priced hot dog roller is as easy to operate as a toaster oven
It features a removable drip tray and a dust cover that helps keep the rollers clean during storage
The bun warmer section can also be used to cook snacks
cons: The unit doesn't heat evenly, so hot dogs may have some brown spots
Thinner hot dogs do not roll as well as plump ones

website_summaries.verdict: Makes good hot dogs and warms buns. Great for heating breads and snacks.
pros: Has removable crumb tray for easy cleaning
Features see-through door so you can watch your hot dogs cook
Separate tray warms buns without overcooking them
Doesn't take up much space in cupboard or on countertop
Not a commercial unit, but it does decent job for a reasonable price
cons: Some hot dogs might not fit
Unit works better if preheated before cooking hot dogs
Won't keep food warm for long period of time

customer_reviews.title: Ballpark Quality Hotdogs at HOME!
customer_reviews.text: It not only cooks the wieners perfectly, it toasts the buns to the precise level it should. It was a gift for my son-in-law. He plugged it in late in the evening after they returned home and around lunch the next day, he called and said he'd already eaten 8 and it was his favorite Christmas present this year and maybe ever.
customer_reviews.author: J in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Cooks hot dogs and warms buns perfectly. I put a bit of cheese on the buns and when the hot dogs are done cooking the cheese is nicely melted. Have given this as a gift to others who think it is better than the hot dog steamers. I concur having bought and tried both of them. Cleans up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: cbrussell

customer_reviews.title: Best grilled hot dogs and you can make at home
customer_reviews.text: I was so pressed to have an authentically broiled hot dog that I researched and found this affordable hot dog grill. I’m very pleased with my new hot dog grill. It was very easy to use and came very quickly; the next day (on a Saturday). As soon as it came I read the directions and followed them and made me my delicious hotdogs on warm buns. It was very straight forward and easy to use, clean and store. I am happy that I have it.
customer_reviews.author: darnnells

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: After 1 month I still love it. You must use precooked hot dogs or brats both are vacuum packed. Not fresh or raw dell will not get hot enough or long enough. Also the dogs or brats must be concentric along its axis so it can roll. It cooks in 20 minutes and toasts the buns. To clean up i use green plastic scrubber after it cools and turn the rollers back on for a short time and catch the residue in the drip tray. I plan to buy another for my cabin,, 11/2018 Still working 18 months later
customer_reviews.author: Big Bill One

customer_reviews.title: Yummy hot dogs
customer_reviews.text: When we first received this purchase we used it right away the hot dogs came out just the way we like them they weren't burnt or anything tasted really good since we can't grill in the winter
customer_reviews.author: mgreen

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for husband, he loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves hotdogs and sausages. I hate standing at the stove turning them to get even browning. This makes us both happy. Clean up is mainly the rollers, takes about the same time as scrubbing a pan.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Glad I have it!
customer_reviews.text: Best way to cook a hot dog. A normal pack of hotdogs spins just fine but I think if you bought long skinny ones they would not spin on this cooker. I didn't try the bun warmer. I 'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. As soon as I got it, I put it together and used it. It made some amazing hot dogs. I used Nathan's. It is a little hard to clean the rollers, but it's worth it! I hope it lasts a while, because I love hot dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Elite cuisine is great!
customer_reviews.text: The best affordable hot dog roller grill! I bought a nostalgia brand and the motor wouldn't even turn the rollers. I advise buyers to stay away from nostalgia brand. Elite cuisine has made a great, common sense hot dog grill and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Yakmaniac

customer_reviews.title: Elite Cuisine
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine item Very well made High Quality,Does the hot dogs great has a very good taste and even warms the buns.all this at a very good price.I would definitely Recommend this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now that i have it, i dont know how I got along without it. I bought another.
customer_reviews.text: Love it for sure. Be sure that you buy large dogs ( circumference) or they will fall between the rollers. Try Thumans if you can get them or maybe those large kosher dogs and that will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: J. COPELAND

customer_reviews.title: ease of use
customer_reviews.text: we have hotdogs regularly and this is so easy to use we can let the kids make their own.
customer_reviews.author: Billy W Laun/Billy's Motorcycle Shop

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest made hotdog cooker I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: The hot dog cooker appeared to be used. Oven the oven tray was bent and misshaped. One of the springs that re-track the oven tray was detached, Oven door catches when opening and closing. Ran the unit to burn off oil on the rollers. Timer continued to run even after the timer bell went off. Still don't know if it even can cook hotdogs. Was so cheap , not even worth my time trying to return the products. What a big let down, compared to other hot dog cooker it appeared to be better made. Appear a number of hot dog oven toaster are defective or damage sold during the past few months from other bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: ann herr-neckar

customer_reviews.title: Just a tad broken
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to. The only minor detail I had with mine is that it came with small parts that broke off on its way here. There's a piece from the lid attachment that's fine so it's holding on from one side only. It's not a huge problem but a tad disappointing to see. Good hot dogs though.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE! Door won't close!
customer_reviews.text: The door for the bun warmer will not stay closed. There is no latch or any mechanism to hold the door shut. I close the door and it immediately falls open. FAIL!
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Works ok.
customer_reviews.text: The rollers are spaced a bit far apart. Nathan's and other slim dogs will sometimes go right between. Other dogs seem to work ok. The hot dog juice burns to the rollers looking like black varnish, and won't clean off. The plastic lids are cheap and don't fit well. Otherwise, it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas V.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hotdogs and so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hotdogs and so easy to use. Made 4 dogs in less then 10 minutes. Have already recommend it to several people. Great for movie nights with my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Ketsenburg

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk. I've never seen anything so cheaply made. The first time I used it I opened the warming tray door and the tray broke away from the door. I hooked it back up but it just won't stay on. The rollers don't heat evenly the center of the dog is burnt and the ends are still cold. It's made of plastic and is just cheap feeling. The timer can't be canceled it has to run out, .For the price of this I didn't expect a premium product but I expected one that would work better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Barnes

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Arrived with a 5 inch crack down the back, even though it was shipped packed well and tightly. It looked like the whole thing could very easily fall apart. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says, perfectly. The bun ...
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says, perfectly. The bun tray doesn't operate smoothly, at all, causing it to detach itself from the door, which it needs to be to remain level, in the oven. You have to open & close it very slowly. Despite this minor defect, we have used it many times and it gets the job done, well.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Defective bread warmer area
customer_reviews.text: I was able to make a few hotdogs but since the bread warmer area was damage it was no point of keeping them. I say them because I requested another one and that one too was damaged .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hot dog cooker
customer_reviews.text: This was better than I expected. I've used this twice so far and was not disappointed. The bun warmer kept the buns warm and toasted until the hot dogs were done. I like this item. It is just right for me and my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Jody's Girl

customer_reviews.title: I cooked them for over the recommended time of 10-15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Machine is very cute and compact. However, the hot dogs aren't fully warm. I cooked them for over the recommended time of 10-15 minutes, mine were closer to 20 mins, and they were luke warm and cold in the center. I haven't tried making sausages on it. Also, if the hot dogs are too thin, it will not rotate them. It's cute, and you get what you pay for, I guess. Fair product for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Alway

customer_reviews.title: Cooks Hot Dogs Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine does a fantastic job evenly roasting your hot dogs from end to end. The bun tray puts the right crisp on you hot dog buns. I really liked how this whole thing works. No more getting out the frying pan, no more putting dogs in water to boil. The clean up was very easy and the unit tucks away for the next roasting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and either BBQ your dogs or cook them another way. This does unit no better in cooking them -- taste the same as if you boiled them! Then, although it cooks 4 dogs, the bun bin only holds 3 buns! And the 3 buns only get 'barely warm' - not hot. Would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Varscsak

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special, just average.
customer_reviews.text: This hot dog cooker isn't bad or terrible by any means. It's just not fantastic either. It's not going to go above and beyond and give you the best hot dogs you've ever had. Regardless, it is acceptable. It is pretty easy to use, but it's a hot dog cooker after all. Would recommend if in need of something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Finkle

customer_reviews.title: CANNOT CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: YOU CANNOT CLEAN THE LID OR THE BARS THAT THE HOTDOGS SIT ON. I AM GOING TO RESEARCH OTHER BRANDS AS THE CONCEPT IS GREAT BUT IT IS NOT CLEANABLE. THE BARS THAT THE DOGS SIT ON ALSO ARE NOT STAINLESS STEEL.
customer_reviews.author: SHE SAID

customer_reviews.title: Not well made..
customer_reviews.text: The front door won’t stay close. It looks good in the picture but when I got it it looks like more like a toy.. like I said the front door would not stay close. Little movement it will pop open..
customer_reviews.author: Flora

customer_reviews.title: Hot Dogs & Buns
customer_reviews.text: It does what I wanted it to do so I'm OK. The hot dogs taste good and are cooked through but the rollers get the dogs browner in center rather than evenly and if you put the buns in to warm at same time as you start the dogs, the buns get 'crispy/hard' rather than just warm. But, as I said, it does what I wanted so I'm happy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: lil

customer_reviews.title: Great if you eat a lot of hotdogs!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy appliance if you eat a lot of hot dogs and have a place to store it. Rollers are not removable, so not easy to clean. Smaller than we thought, but does fit four regular buns in the warmer side by side. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I used this oven for the first time and after one use the rollers burn looking and I could not clean up well. Also took too long to cook the hot dogs and brats and didn't cook well on the inside. Returned it the first time I bought it because it looked used but just to lazy to return again this time.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Brown

customer_reviews.title: Returning it
customer_reviews.text: After one use and the food didn't get done. It didn't get hot not did it that's the bread. Will be returning this one .
customer_reviews.author: Wolfman

customer_reviews.title: Cooks to perfection
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It tastes like it’s right off the 7-Eleven grill. Perfect hot dogs in less than 15 minutes. Buy it...you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: Center Heats Faster
customer_reviews.text: If you are cooking one or two items it's good. If you are doing 3 or 4 the center two positions are hotter than the outer ones. The timer at this point is useless because you have to rotate your food. Decent product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and cool for the. Right occasion. For me, it was too small. And took too long to warm up the hot dogs.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Real hot dog cooking!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked at this item for months and finally made the purchace. It is everything it says it is. No more boiled or microwave hotdogs for me.
customer_reviews.author: mtmartianesq

customer_reviews.title: Great for a two people and priced well.
customer_reviews.text: This product cooks hot dogs and sausages well. Heats up buns good, no burning. Great for two people or small crowd. Clean up can be challenging. The rollers are hard to clean, the walls and bottom are easy. Could use an electronic cord holder.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Cooks well
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is a hot dog lover, he thinks this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Just an ok buy
customer_reviews.text: Not as convenient as I was hoping but still does a good job. Not very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Claire DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Hotdog 101: I love this product a lot
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my husband. He loves it and we use it a lot . Very easy to use and clean. I might get another one for my in-laws because it’s just very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT. I have purchased this for someone and ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. I have purchased this for someone and they love it so much that all of their friends, especially the ones with children, have purchased it too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary White

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thinking of sending it back.Does not steam the buns warm.The hot dogs start to burn before they are cooked
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: work great, I got it for my sister since my nephews are always making hot dogs and they love it
customer_reviews.author: Amparo

customer_reviews.title: great taste. U can only do 4 at a ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it, great taste. U can only do 4 at a time but its usually just the 2of us. Buns are toasty but soft. Good deal for $30.
customer_reviews.author: Marymax

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift, can't wait to try this.
customer_reviews.text: We love hot dogs, but in the winter it is too cold to cook outside. This will be perfect and just can't wait till christmas to see the look on folks faces when they see this great little cooker....
customer_reviews.author: Nancy McKee

customer_reviews.title: Good as a novelty item.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this most for a novelty thing...works well enough but don't really need it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rick Scott

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Serious do not buy this toaster if you want to live besides arriving damaged when you try to turn it off stays on you have to disconnect it all the way for it to turn off worse purchase ever
customer_reviews.author: Vy

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Certain rollers do cook the hot dogs more quickly that others (I believe the two outside ones are the quick cookers), but still super awesome. We’ve only used it a few times, but hot dogs are a favorite in our house so I’m sure it’ll get plenty of love!
customer_reviews.author: jude

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product to make a quick snack for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Leoul my boy

customer_reviews.title: Simple and delicious hot dogs
customer_reviews.text: The hot dogs come out heated through and delicious. The oven only holds 3 buns but they don’t dry out. No manual included in box, but .pdf version available on Amazon. Scrubbing the rollers is time consuming. Even with these shortcomings, we enjoy this cooker.
customer_reviews.author: JohnCarol

customer_reviews.title: This is a great machine! Cooks the hotdogs quickly and fully
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine! Cooks the hotdogs quickly and fully. It can cook up to 4 at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Desi Marie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: way smaller then i expected, you can fit 2 hot dogs only
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Berg

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Very slow . Take 15 to 20 minutes to warm up 4 hotdogs. Good for kids use.
customer_reviews.author: Nabil Ashiekh

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply constructed
customer_reviews.text: Unit does the job but not confident it will last very long. Mostly brittle plastic and extremely thin metal parts. There were multiple, sharp, very small shards of plastic on edges. Able to file them down after being scratched multiple times..
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Cooks well!
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes terrific hot dogs. I Wish it didn’t take longer than expected to cook them. But, worth it. It warms the buns well, too.
customer_reviews.author: LeRoy Dreyfuss

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Please whip off after every use. Or access will stick to rollers. But fortunately I can use a small soap pad to get the access off rollers very Easy. But husband enjoys it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great hot dog!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great, small scale hot dog roller. This is my second one. The first I had for years and enjoyed using it. If it lasts a few years I will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E

customer_reviews.title: Nice hot dog toaster
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. He loves it. Perfect size & easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Not really interesting
customer_reviews.text: Bought the toaster don’t know what’s wrong with it but what they showing isn’t really how it’s work the bottom part don’t really toast and the top work so slow hmmm don’t like it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time! Only disappointment is that it only dies 4 dogs at a time. But it doesn't take up a lot of space so it is worth it!

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: nice looking but in this case looks are not everything cheap plastic

customer_reviews.title: HOT Dog
customer_reviews.text: My grandson enjoyed this product that went along well for his movie night

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my man and he was soooo happy. Like a kid in a candy store lol. The hot dogs taste just like from a convenient store.

customer_reviews.title: Hard too clean
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered I thought the rollers came out for cleaning, they do not
customer_reviews.author: R Henry

customer_reviews.title: Its one of the best for sure s low price
customer_reviews.text: My one complaint you can only put 4 hotdogs at a time. I realize that was a easy fit. I brought two...still a great price

customer_reviews.title: not kool

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this purchase, fun to use and hot dogs are great!
customer_reviews.author: brenda rahal

customer_reviews.title: Hotdog griller
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered on time. Just used it and hotdog grilled evenly. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a product such as this. Thank you and thank you Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat properly
customer_reviews.text: Takes literally forever for hotdogs to cook and the bun warmer can't really fit more than 2 buns Seems like a toy for kids
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The product cannot be cleaned after use. It stains and the rollers arent strong enough to roll anything that isnt perfectly round

customer_reviews.title: Elite Gourmet Hot Dog Roller Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: My Family And I Love This Hot Dog Roller... So Easy To Use. And I Have Limited Counter Space And This Is Small And Don't Take Up A Lot Of Room. 5 Stars *****

customer_reviews.title: it worked ok at first i used it twice and ...
customer_reviews.text: it worked ok at first i used it twice and now it don't warm anymore just rolls , lasted less than 6 months

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact the you can only make a couple at a time that way there no waste

customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk not described properly at all on line small piece of junk do not buy

customer_reviews.title: The product does nothing that is expected
customer_reviews.text: The hot dogs were over done in the middle....the ends were cool....the buns were burnt on the bottom....very disappointed in it's performance
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Love this little hot dog machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this little hot dog machine! We use it in our snack bar at the school and it is just what we needed.

customer_reviews.title: Received this as a Christmas gift and love it
customer_reviews.text: My wife gave me this for Christmas and I love it. I use it every chance I get to do hotdogs and sausages.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I gave it as a Christmas gift to my father and we had hot dogs for lunch. They tasted really good!

customer_reviews.title: Love it

product_meta.title: Elite Gourmet EHD-051B Hot Dog Toaster Oven, 30-Min Timer, Stainless Steel Heat Rollers Bake & Crumb Tray, World Series Baseball, 4 Bun Capacity, Black
product_meta.description: Ahhhhh, nothing better than a great hot dog at the ballpark. With the Elite Cuisine Hot Dog Roller/Toaster Oven, you can have that ball park hot dog taste anytime! 5 stainless steel rollers ensure your hot dogs are evenly cooked every time and the built-in toaster makes the perfect bun! The versatility of the Elite Cuisine Hot Dog Roller / Toaster Oven makes preparing a wide variety of other breads and snacks as close as your own kitchen! So let your imagination take over for that next great event at home!
feature_bullets: Five stainless steel heated rollers great for cooking hot dogs or sausages on all sides
Oil Retaining Tray catches oil drippings from cooking hot dogs
Great for heating other breads & snacks too.
Features 210 total watts of power, auto thermostat, timer, bake tray, crumb tray that removes for easy cleaning, see through oven door and compact design

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars296 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
